verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

\w Say|strong="H3478"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w Whosoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* approacheth \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w having|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w What|strong="H2233"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* soever \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* Aaron \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w leper|strong="H6879"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w hath|strong="H5315"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* \w issue|strong="H2100"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*. \w And|strong="H3318"\w* whoso \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w dead|strong="H5315"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w goeth|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*;

or \w whosoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w creeping|strong="H8318"\w* \w thing|strong="H8318"\w*, whereby \w he|strong="H3605"\w* may \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H2930"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*, or \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* whom \w he|strong="H3605"\w* may take \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w*, \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* hath;

\w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w such|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, \w unless|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \w his|strong="H7364"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3899"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H8121"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*; \w and|strong="H3899"\w* afterward \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

\w That|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* dieth \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w itself|strong="H5038"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w torn|strong="H2966"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2966"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w himself|strong="H2930"\w* therewith: \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*, lest \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* therein, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* sanctifieth \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w There|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* eat \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w thing|strong="H6944"\w*: \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sojourner|strong="H8453"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*’s, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hired|strong="H7916"\w* \w servant|strong="H7916"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w thing|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w any|strong="H5315"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w purchase|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*; \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w such|strong="H1931"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w born|strong="H3211"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* married \w unto|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* heave-offering \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* widow, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w divorced|strong="H1644"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w child|strong="H2233"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* father’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* father’s \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w thereof|strong="H3548"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man eat \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w thing|strong="H6944"\w* \w unwittingly|strong="H7684"\w*, \w then|strong="H3254"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w part|strong="H2549"\w* \w thereof|strong="H3548"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w thing|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \add so\add* cause \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w bringeth|strong="H3068"\w* \w guilt|strong="H5771"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* eat \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* sanctifieth \w them|strong="H5375"\w*.
\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H7126"\w*, \w Whosoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sojourners|strong="H1616"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w*, \w whether|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*, \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* freewill-offerings, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* burnt-offering;

\w that|strong="H1241"\w* ye may \w be|strong="H1241"\w* \w accepted|strong="H7522"\w*, \add ye shall offer\add* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, \w of|strong="H7522"\w* \w the|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H1241"\w*, \w of|strong="H7522"\w* \w the|strong="H1241"\w* \w sheep|strong="H3775"\w*, \w or|strong="H1241"\w* \w of|strong="H7522"\w* \w the|strong="H1241"\w* \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w hath|strong="H3971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w ye|strong="H7126"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w whosoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* peace-offerings \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w accomplish|strong="H6381"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* freewill-offering, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w accepted|strong="H7522"\w*; \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* therein.

\w Blind|strong="H5788"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w maimed|strong="H2782"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w having|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wen|strong="H2990"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w scurvy|strong="H1618"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w scabbed|strong="H3217"\w*, \w ye|strong="H7126"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* \w offering|strong="H7126"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* fire \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Either|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bullock|strong="H7794"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w* \w that|strong="H6213"\w* hath \w anything|strong="H6213"\w* \w superfluous|strong="H8311"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* lacking \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w parts|strong="H7038"\w*, \w that|strong="H6213"\w* mayest \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* freewill-offering; \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w accepted|strong="H7521"\w*.

\w That|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H6213"\w* stones \w bruised|strong="H4600"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w crushed|strong="H3807"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w broken|strong="H5423"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w*, \w ye|strong="H7126"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H7126"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add thus\add* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* land.
